"I Want to Hunt a Dragon!":
"The dragon is the king of all kings in RPGs!
There seems to be a dragon in every volcano, meow!
If I can beat one of those things my stock with the ladies will soar...err, ummm, what I mean is...
In my capabilities as a righteous ARKS I have to eliminate that dangerous thing!
Meow about coming with me to fight it?
*Clear with an S Rank traveling only with Kuro"
